title.rendered: T20 World Cup: Appreciation and confidence have made Surya Kumar Yadav more consistent, says Sachin Tendulkar

content.rendered:
Check before use, not directly relevant

The legendary Indian Cricketer and all-time world favorite Sachin Tendulkar quoted his regards for the upcoming Indian Batsman Surya Kumar Yadav. He was speaking with the Times of India for the complete pre-analysis of Teams that participated in the T20 World Cup in Australia.

Tendulkar has seen the growth graph of Surya when he was playing for the MI team in IPL.

When Tendulkar was asked that What was the important thing for his evolution? Tendulkar replied, Appreciation and Confidence.

He had the potential to play knocks since last year. But success and appreciation have improved his performance has changed with these things as a person too. He is playing with improvements upon encouragement and appreciation. Surya Kumar is playing more confidently and fearless for his selection in the side.

Sachin Tendulkar

Surya Kumar’s performance is making India’s hope big in this World cup.

_________________________________________________________________________________

Read also:T20 World Cup warm-up: Mohammed Shami’s fiery over earns India comeback win against Australia
